reset() - Method in class game.actors.npcs.Abxervyer
Override the reset() method from the abstract Enemy class to reset the health attribute of Abxervyer since it does not remove from the map but update its health attribute after player dies due to any causes and triggers the game reset
reset() - Method in class game.actors.npcs.Enemy
Provides a way for all spawned enemies expect the boss, Abxervyer, on the GameMap will be removed from the GameMap after player dies due to any causes and trigger the game reset.
reset() - Method in class game.actors.Player
Provides a way for the Player to respawn to location where they started their journey, value of the attributes (HP and stamina) will be reset to full meanwhile the maximum values of the player’s attributes will be kept as what it was before the player dies, reset the player's wallet (runes) to 0 and drop these runes in the last location where the player last stood after player dies due to any causes and triggers the game reset.
reset() - Method in class game.grounds.Gate
Provides a way for the unlocked gates to be locked again after player dies due to any causes and triggers the game reset
reset() - Method in class game.items.Rune
Provides a way for all the runes to wiped off when it is on the ground except the runes dropped by the Player after player dies due to any causes and triggers the game reset
reset() - Method in interface game.reset.Resettable
Provides a way for any entities be it actors or items or grounds on the GameMap that have to be reset after player dies due to any causes
resetFocusTurn() - Method in class game.weapons.Broadsword
Reset the attribute 'remainingFocusTurn' to 5
